Case# MKPinAnnotationColor.red

iOS 3.0–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.0–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedmacOS 10.9–10.11Deprecated

```
case red
```

Deprecated

Use the [`pinTintColor`](/documentation/mapkit/mkpinannotationview/pintintcolor) property to set the pin color instead.

## [Discussion](/documentation/mapkit/mkpinannotationcolor/red#Discussion)

The head of the pin is red. Red pins indicate destination points on the map.
